item.title: Welcome
item.description: Hi and welcome to my blog. I am going to talk on my hobbies for reverse engineering, exploitation and for some cryptanalysis. So let’s define these words. Reverse engineering is the art/technic to understand and modify software or hardware that have not beem made to be open and modificated. This is only the technic. The objectives could vary a lot of and a lot. This could be for malware analysis, when an antivirus need to be updated by understanding how the malware works.
